message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you the product at a price of $15000. I believe this will be a great investment for you. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer! While I appreciate the product, $15000 is a bit outside my budget. Would you consider $10000?
Thanks for your response, Bob! I appreciate your interest. How about we meet in the middle? I'm willing to sell the product for $13500. Let me know if that works for you!
Thanks for coming down a bit, Alice! I'm still hoping to get closer to my budget. Would you consider $11000?
I appreciate your counteroffer, Bob! How about I lower my price a bit more to $12500? I believe this is a fair deal. Let me know your thoughts!
